did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: St. John's Church (Washington, D.C.) Architectural drawings, 1816, 1952.
did.physdesc: Architectural drawings, photographs, publication, and manuscripts.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes seven drawings, three postcard views, eight photographs, five negative photostats of drawings, two typescript articles, and a publication of St. John's Church in Washington, D.C.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes seven drawings, three postcard views, eight photographs, five negative photostats of drawings, two typescript articles, and a publication of St. John's Church in Washington, D.C.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: St. John's Church (Washington, D.C.) Architectural drawings, #3411. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box and Map case folder. Online guide unavailable.
